name: Andrew Anthony Gerst
title: Senior Software Engineer (Full-Stack)
statement: If you are looking for the perfect engineer then I am not a good fit however there is not a single thing I can't or haven't been able to accomplish throughout my entire 11+ year career. My unmatched [i]perspicacity[/i] and work ethic, hustle-and-grind mentality, resourcefulness, [i]indefatigability[/i], and pure determination make me an extremely valuable engineer while also being a [i]collaborative[/i] teammate prioritizing the needs of the business and my colleagues.
statements: I need a job [i]asap[/i]! My bank account balance is [i]negative[/i]! I'm fine with work trials and contracting!
I am extremely [i]self-motivated[/i], adaptable, and personable fostering strong working relationships!
I was Checkr's 4th engineer working on international expansion and rapidly scaling our team!
I was Passport's 5th engineer contributing to every single functionality of the platform imaginable!

Major Product Enhancements: Led the creation of multiple new screenings that expanded our product capabilities
Led the implementation of [b]Amplitude[/b] analytics that significantly improved our product insights
Created a [b]Ruby on Rails[/b] platform that dramatically reduced the complexity of building new screenings
Reduced developer frustration and technical debt by unifying multiple divergent products
Improved candidate experience by removing the need to print and fill out PDF documents
Improved screening TAT by creating [b]Cron/Rake/Temporal[/b] jobs to monitor and resolve stuck workflows
Created [b]Datadog[/b] monitors and [b]Snowflake/Looker[/b] dashboards to improve observability
Mentored our summer interns and led the project from inception to prod deployment
Many other things including [b]React/TypeScript[/b] front-end projects...
Improved Developer Productivity (Above &: Reduced the time 50+ engineers spent onboarding from weeks down to hours
Created scripts to set up and run multiple services in a local dev environment
Ensured a smooth transition from Intel to ARM based MacBook architecture
Created scripts automating workflows that required manual interactions
Created [b]Bash[/b] shell scripts to ease the administration of our [b]Kubernetes[/b] clusters
Created [b]Ruby Thor[/b] scripts that automated various on-call support tasks

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.responsibilities: Containerized apps to [b]Docker[/b] and made improvements for both our frontend ([b]Angular[/b]) and backend ([b]PHP/Laravel[/b])

Modernized & Scaled Architecture: Led the creation of a [b]Node/TypeScript[/b] platform enabling integrations with our public API
Migrated our legacy [b]PHP[/b] monolith to microservices using [b]AWS Lambda[/b] and [b]Node/TypeScript[/b]
Migrated our databases from [b]MySQL[/b] to [b]DynamoDB[/b] for improved performance
Migrated our web apps to [b]React/TypeScript[/b] and our [b]iOS[/b] apps to [b]Swift[/b]
Promoted A High-Performance Culture: Interviewed candidates for roles up to VP of Engineering
Evaluated programming challenge submissions from candidates
Streamlined our onboarding process via documentation and automation
Created many tools enabling new ways for engineers to work more efficiently
Mentored peers and was a highly available, trusted source for advice and pair programming
Core Business Expertise: Lead maintainer of our [b]Python[/b] rate engine, a critical component for facilitating payments
Built custom mobile and web apps for 20+ of our high-volume clients in a scalable way
Implemented third-party integrations to satisfy RFP requirements to win new clients
Added [b]i18n[/b] support in our apps so that we could expand to markets internationally
Built integrations with our in-house [b]PCI[/b]-compliant payment gateway service
Additional Accomplishments: Developed the legacy monolith system using [b]Python[/b], [b]PHP[/b], and [b]MySQL[/b]
Developed the legacy mobile apps using [b]Titanium[/b] and [b]Java[/b]
Developed the legacy web apps using [b]jQuery[/b] and [b]GWT/Java[/b]
Developed the legacy strings system to handle internationalization
Developed the SMS/IVR [b]Twilio[/b] integrations to support users without smartphones
Maintained the iOS [b]Swift[/b] apps through multiple Swift versions
Automated the build and archive process for iOS App Store releases
Created the white label apps on [b]Android[/b], [b]Titanium[/b], [b]Swift[/b], and Web platforms
Created integrations using [b]BLE[/b] and [b]NFC[/b] for validating transit tickets using [b]Android[/b] devices
Developed the apps for enforcement officers to monitor using [b]LPR[/b] to issue and print citations
Developed the validation system for businesses to create and offer discounts to their customers
Created the [b]Vagrant[/b] dev environment influencing our shift towards infrastructure as code ([b]IaC[/b])
Created the [b]Ansible[/b] playbook for efficiently configuring and maintaining engineer MacBooks
Created the modern rate engine on [b]AWS Lambda[/b] using [b]Node/TypeScript[/b] and [b]DynamoDB[/b]
Analyzed data and created visualizations for various metrics using [b]Snowflake[/b]
Created various shared [b]NPM[/b] packages to use across multiple microservices
Transformed and imported the zone, rate, and restriction data for multiple cities
Created comparison scripts to ensure backwards compatibility when versioning APIs
Created API integration testing scripts to verify services are deployed and running correctly
Led the creation of the wallet payment system for fleets of vehicles used by UPS and FedEx
Load and stress-tested the APIs using [b]Ab/Wrk[/b] to measure and improve performance metrics
Created an integration with [b]Lob[/b] to look up address information and mail collection letters
Implemented [b]SMS[/b] features including preferences, reminders, receipts, fees, and taxes
Implemented the process and scripts for safely handling database migrations
Created the [b]Makefile[/b] that automated our legacy local dev environment
Created an integration with [b]Cashtie[/b] enabling cash payments for tolling
Created the [b]Swagger OpenAPI[/b] Schema to document our APIs
Migrated the iOS parking app from [b]Titanium[/b] to [b]Swift[/b]
Created the iOS transit app in [b]Swift[/b]
A million other things...

experience.title: Computer Programmer
experience.responsibilities: I built a YouTube app for people with disabilities who access their computers via 2 switches.

education.university: [url=https://www.unc.edu]University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill[/url]
education.achievements: I placed in multiple programming competitions and hackathons both individually and with teammates.

projects.name: My Games
projects.desc: I enjoy building browser-based games in my free time using a game engine I wrote from scratch.
